item.title: Jaeger Code Structure
item.description: Here is the main logic for jaeger agent and jaeger collector. (Based on jaeger 1.13.1) Jaeger Agent Link to heading Collect UDP packet from 6831 port, convert it to model.Span, send to collector by gRPC Jaeger Collector Link to heading Process gRPC or process packet from Zipkin(port 9411). Jaeger Query Link to heading Listen gRPC and HTTP request from 16686.
